mapper.select: SELECT r.summoner_review_seq, r.match_id, reviewer_site_code, reviewer_puuid, target_puuid, is_up, comment, is_up, r.reg_dt, upd_dt, del_dt, t.tag_code, rt.tag_value, rt.tag_description, rt.tag_updown, COUNT(rt.*) OVER (PARTITION BY r.summoner_review_seq) as frequent_count FROM site_summoner_review r LEFT OUTER JOIN site_summoner_review_tag t ON r.summoner_review_seq = t.summoner_review_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN site_review_tag rt ON t.tag_code = rt.tag_code WHERE del_dt IS NULL and reviewer_puuid = #{reviewerPuuid}

WITH ReviewBase AS ( SELECT DISTINCT r.summoner_review_seq, r.reg_dt FROM site_summoner_review r WHERE del_dt IS NULL AND reviewer_site_code = #{reviewerSiteCode} ORDER BY r.reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{itemsPerPage} OFFSET #{offset} ) SELECT r.summoner_review_seq, r.match_id, reviewer_site_code, reviewer_puuid, target_puuid, is_up, comment, is_up, r.reg_dt, upd_dt, del_dt, t.tag_code, rt.tag_value, rt.tag_description, rt.tag_updown, COUNT(rt.*) OVER (PARTITION BY r.summoner_review_seq) as frequent_count FROM ReviewBase rb INNER JOIN site_summoner_review r ON rb.summoner_review_seq = r.summoner_review_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN site_summoner_review_tag t ON r.summoner_review_seq = t.summoner_review_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN site_review_tag rt ON t.tag_code = rt.tag_code ORDER BY r.reg_dt DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.summoner_review_seq) FROM site_summoner_review r WHERE del_dt IS NULL AND reviewer_site_code = #{reviewerSiteCode}

WITH ReviewBase AS ( SELECT DISTINCT r.summoner_review_seq, r.reg_dt FROM site_summoner_review r WHERE del_dt IS NULL AND target_puuid = #{targetPuuid} ORDER BY r.reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{itemsPerPage} OFFSET #{offset} ) SELECT r.summoner_review_seq, r.match_id, reviewer_site_code, reviewer_puuid, target_puuid, is_up, comment, is_up, is_anonymous, r.reg_dt, upd_dt, del_dt, t.tag_code, rt.tag_value, rt.tag_description, rt.tag_updown, COUNT(rt.*) OVER (PARTITION BY r.summoner_review_seq) as frequent_count FROM ReviewBase rb INNER JOIN site_summoner_review r ON rb.summoner_review_seq = r.summoner_review_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN site_summoner_review_tag t ON r.summoner_review_seq = t.summoner_review_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN site_review_tag rt ON t.tag_code = rt.tag_code ORDER BY r.reg_dt DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.summoner_review_seq) FROM site_summoner_review r WHERE del_dt IS NULL AND target_puuid = #{targetPuuid}
SELECT tag_code, tag_value, tag_description, tag_updown, tag_category FROM site_review_tag ORDER BY tag_updown desc, reg_dt desc
SELECT category_key, category_value, reg_dt FROM site_review_tag_category ORDER BY reg_dt desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_summoner_review ( reviewer_site_code, reviewer_puuid, target_puuid, is_up, comment, match_id, is_anonymous ) VALUES ( #{reviewerSiteCode}, #{reviewerPuuid}, #{targetPuuid}, #{isUp}, #{comment}, #{matchId}, #{isAnonymous} )

INSERT INTO site_summoner_review_tag ( summoner_review_seq, tag_code ) VALUES
(#{reviewSeq}, #{tagCode})
mapper.select: SELECT target_puuid as puuid, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = true THEN 1 END) as upCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = false THEN 1 END) as downCount, COUNT(*) AS totalReviewCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN reg_dt >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END) AS last30DayReviewCnt FROM site_summoner_review where target_puuid = #{targetPuuid} and del_dt is NULL group by target_puuid

SELECT target_puuid as puuid, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = true THEN 1 END) as upCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = false THEN 1 END) as downCount FROM site_summoner_review where target_puuid = #{targetPuuid} and del_dt is NULL group by target_puuid

select ssrt.tag_code, srt.tag_value, srt.tag_description, srt.tag_updown, count(*) as frequentCount from site_summoner_review ssr inner join site_summoner_review_tag ssrt on (ssr.summoner_review_seq = ssrt.summoner_review_seq) inner join site_review_tag srt on (ssrt.tag_code = srt.tag_code) where target_puuid = #{targetPuuid} and ssr.del_dt IS NULL group by ssrt.tag_code, srt.tag_value, srt.tag_description, srt.tag_updown limit #{limit}

select champ_id , champ_name, count(*) as playCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = true THEN 1 END) as upCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = false THEN 1 END) as downCount from lol_match_participant lm inner join site_summoner_review ssr on (lm.match_id = ssr.match_id and lm.puuid = ssr.target_puuid) where puuid = #{puuid} group by champ_id, champ_name order by count(*) desc limit 5

WITH positions AS ( SELECT unnest(ARRAY['TOP', 'JUNGLE', 'MIDDLE', 'BOTTOM', 'UTILITY']) as position ) SELECT p.position, COUNT(lm.puuid) as playCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = true THEN 1 END) as upCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_up = false THEN 1 END) as downCount FROM positions p LEFT JOIN lol_match_participant lm ON lm.position = p.position AND lm.puuid = #{puuid} LEFT JOIN site_summoner_review ssr ON lm.match_id = ssr.match_id AND lm.puuid = ssr.target_puuid GROUP BY p.position ORDER BY CASE p.position WHEN 'TOP' THEN 1 WHEN 'JUNGLE' THEN 2 WHEN 'MIDDLE' THEN 3 WHEN 'BOTTOM' THEN 4 WHEN 'UTILITY' THEN 5 END

INSERT INTO site_review_tag_suggestion ( review_seq, tag_value, tag_description, is_up, tag_category ) VALUES

mapper.select: SELECT lm.game_mode, lm.game_create_dt, lmp.champ_name, lm.queue_id FROM lol_match lm INNER JOIN lol_match_participant lmp on (lm.match_id = lmp.match_id) WHERE lm.match_id = #{matchId} and lmp.puuid = #{targetPuuid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM site_summoner_review r1 WHERE r1.reg_dt > ( SELECT reg_dt FROM site_summoner_review WHERE summoner_review_seq = #{reviewSeq} )

SELECT r.summoner_review_seq, r.match_id, reviewer_site_code, reviewer_puuid, target_puuid, is_up, comment, is_up, r.reg_dt, upd_dt, del_dt, t.tag_code, rt.tag_value, rt.tag_description, rt.tag_updown, COUNT(rt.*) OVER (PARTITION BY r.summoner_review_seq) as frequent_count FROM site_summoner_review r LEFT OUTER JOIN site_summoner_review_tag t ON r.summoner_review_seq = t.summoner_review_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN site_review_tag rt ON t.tag_code = rt.tag_code WHERE reviewer_puuid = #{reviewerPuuid} and target_puuid = #{targetPuuid} and del_dt is null

WITH total_counts AS ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN is_up = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as up_count, SUM(CASE WHEN is_up = false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as down_count FROM site_summoner_review WHERE target_puuid = #{targetPuuid} AND match_id = #{matchId} ) SELECT tc.up_count, tc.down_count, lmp.champ_id as reviewer_champ_id, lmp.champ_name as reviewer_champ_name, srt.tag_code, srt.tag_value, srt.tag_description, srt.tag_updown, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY srt.tag_code) as frequent_count FROM site_summoner_review ssr JOIN site_summoner_review_tag ssrt ON ssr.summoner_review_seq = ssrt.summoner_review_seq JOIN site_review_tag srt ON ssrt.tag_code = srt.tag_code JOIN lol_match_participant lmp ON (ssr.match_id = lmp.match_id and ssr.reviewer_puuid = lmp.puuid) CROSS JOIN total_counts tc WHERE ssr.target_puuid = #{targetPuuid} AND lmp.match_id = #{matchId} ORDER BY frequent_count desc
